title: [Unturned 3.14.4.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-14 19:32 编辑 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum: http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-4-0-update-notes.4947/
部分翻译: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-555533-1-1.html
3.14.4.0 Rocket: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-543521-1-1.html
Additions/添加
Added claim flag. [ID 1158]添加 领地旗. [ID 1158]Added maple syrup, dough, pancakes, waffles, doughnuts and pizza. [IDs 1159-1164]添加 枫糖浆，面团，煎饼，松饼，甜甜圈，披萨. [IDs 1159-1164]Added nailgun. [IDs 1165-1166]添加 钉枪. [IDs 1165]Added police launch. [ID 108]添加 警艇. [ID 108]Added deadzone node, biohazard suit protects against this.添加 死亡辐射区，穿上防化衣可以防止死亡.（防化服仅仅只能缓解辐射BUFF的效果）Added button to center map on player.添加地图上以玩家为中心的按钮.Added separate durability to suppressors rather than using gun durability.添加消音器的独立耐久值，而不是使用枪械的耐久值.Added search and hide uncraftable filters to crafting.添加合成表的搜索功能和隐藏你不无需的物品.Added option to swap between black and white interface.添加UI界面可以切换黑色和白色的选项.
Improvements/优化
Improved clientside item physics to clamp within server range.优化客户端物品物理设置可以限制在服务器的范围内.Improved performance of navmesh tile updates significantly.优化导航网格平面性能更杰出.Improved zombie update and audio performance.优化僵尸以及声音性能.Improved scrollbars to get tinted as well.优化滚动条可调整顏色.Improved skycrane's electromagnet to be usable in singleplayer. [Default Ctrl]优化吊挂直升机的电磁铁可以在单人中使用. [默认键 Ctrl]
Tweaks/调整
Tweaked arms to shake as death approaches.调整手臂晃动为死亡方式.Tweaked progress bar text to not tint.调整加载条文字无法调整颜色.Tweaked bone quality names.调整骨架质量名称.Tweaked skills label text alignment.调整技能标签文本对准.Tweaked shadow normal bias based on lighting quality.调整正常阴影的偏差是基于照明质量调整.Tweaked status icon colors.调整状态图标的颜色.Tweaked port inputs to round incase of query port input.调整端口输入查询.Tweaked punching only allowed in survival.调整只可在生存模式徒手攻击.
Fixes/修复
Fixed shooting from inside objects on server.修复服务器从物体里面开枪问题.Fixed potential cause of stuck while loading server.修复可能导致取读服务器界面卡的原因之一.Fixed dragging items with triple monitors.修复三重显示器的物品抓取问题.Fixed attachments labels with triple monitors.修复三重显示器的附件标签问题.Fixed unable to use same key in commands list.修复无法在命令列表上使用相同的钥匙.Fixed tinting of server name colors.修复服务器名称颜色问题.Fixed tinting of inventory quality/headers.修复背包着色问题.Fixed tinting of blueprint quality/amount labels.修复背包质量/数量标签的问题.Fixed crash when inventory packet arrived early.修复背包信息提早显示导致崩溃.Fixed potential cause of invisible skin bug.修复有可能导致隐形皮肤的原因之一.Fixed character index changing with overlay enabled.修复覆盖层启用时角色指数变化.Fixed water culling on extra large maps.修复大型地图水消除的问题.Fixed boats with no fuel to despawn.修复没燃料的船自动消失的问题.Fixed editor to verify object region.修复编辑器验证物体区域.Fixed color tag regex.修复颜色标签的正则.Fixed freezing damage prediction.修复寒伤预测.Fixed status icon positions in arena/horde mode.修复竞技场模式/尸潮模式状态图标位置.

如有错误，还外指出.

PS: 3.14.5.0预告  https://trello.com/b/M2jI6d2e/unturned-roadmap 
新服装新背包新武器以及更多...
